info.title: Lule Sámi Speller
Julevsámi čállindárkisteaddji
Julevsaemien staeriedimmiedïrregh
Julevsáme duollatjállemdárkastus
Lulesamisk stavekontroll
Lulesamisk rättstavning
Julevsaamen oikoluku
info.description: This is an fst-based speller for Lule Sámi made by Divvun/Giellatekno/UiT. It is based on the normative subset of the morphological analyser for Lule Sámi. The source code can be found at: https://victorio.uit.no/langtech/trunk/langs/smj/ License: GPL3+.

acceptor.title: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary Lule Sámi
acceptor.description: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary for Lule Sámi compiled for HFST.

errmodel.title: Levenshtein edit distance transducer
errmodel.description: Correction model for keyboard misstrokes, at most 2 per word.
